pages.text: $(o)What if I told you, there was a way to synthesize Tesla ingots?$()$(br2)Well yes, you can. Provided of course, you've found a few naturally first.
The synthesizer is quite the beast to craft. It requires multiple end-game resources. If you're part of a team, it might be a good idea to split up and scour the world for different items.

pages.title: Operation Procedure
pages.text: The synthesizer requires $(l)four$() inputs before an ingot can be synthesized. You need a $(l)stone block, lapis lazuli, conductive ingot$(), and for the fuel, a single $(l)molten ingot$().$(br)Each process takes 20 minutes, or one full day/night cycle.

If the process is interrupted via breaking of the synthesizer, then your ingredients will be dropped. You will lose the fuel.$(br2)Since the process takes so long, and you cannot move it while it is processing, I recommend putting it in a safe place away from other players that might want to prevent you from obtaining Tesla-level gear.
